record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - September 07, 2007)

[Page: H10308]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on September 7, 2007, I was unable to be present for all rollcall votes due to a family medical emergency.
If present, I would have voted accordingly on the following rollcall votes: Roll No. 860--"nay"; roll No. 861--"nay"; roll No. 862--"aye"; roll No. 863--"aye"; roll No. 864--"nay".
